title: High Tech High Life: William Gibson and Timothy Leary in Conversation (1989)
description: The story of Timothy Leary’s conversation with William Gibson is here.  This is most of the text as it was published in the first edition of MONDO 2000 magazine TIMOTHY LEARY: If you could put Neuromancer into one sentence, how would you describe it? WILLIAM GIBSON: What’s most important to me is that it’s about the […]
